title: 8-Day Tour of Traditional Peru
description: Dear friend, if your flight arrives directly to Lima, then we should take advantage of it and start our Tour in Peru taking a walk through this wonderful city (Lima, historical and modern area), and then continue with the best of Ica, where we will visit the wineries and we will take a very fun ride on the famous tubulars through the Ica dunes. We close our trip to Peru with a visit to the city of Cusco, where we will visit the wonderful Humantay Lagoon, the Mountain of Seven Colors and the imposing Machupicchu. Without a doubt, this trip to Peru will be the best of your life. What are you waiting for! Reserve and start enjoying each of your days in PERU to the fullest.
all_descriptions: Dear friend, if your flight arrives directly to Lima, then we should take advantage of it and start our Tour in Peru taking a walk through this wonderful city (Lima, historical and modern area), and then continue with the best of Ica, where we will visit the wineries and we will take a very fun ride on the famous tubulars through the Ica dunes. We close our trip to Peru with a visit to the city of Cusco, where we will visit the wonderful Humantay Lagoon, the Mountain of Seven Colors and the imposing Machupicchu. Without a doubt, this trip to Peru will be the best of your life. What are you waiting for! Reserve and start enjoying each of your days in PERU to the fullest.

Denver, CO8 contributions

8 Day Peru Tour by Waman/Tourrador Adventues

Jun 2025 â€¢ Family
We, a group of 11 from Colorado, had an awesome time in Peru with Waman Adventures / Tourradar. Our 8 day trip was planned around the Inca Sun Festival, including sight seeing, paragliding, cooking classes, buggy rides, sand boarding, swimming with Sea Lions, hiking Rainbow mountains and plenty of time in between to shop and relax. We covered all major attractions in Lima and Cusco. Our tour operators are local and the price is reasonable. Hotels were decent and transports were comfortable. Overall, the service was great. We highly recommend this tour.

Luz Lucero. Our concierge Luz and I planned this trip 3 months ago. Our group of 11 with various ages, abilities, interests, food choices is a tough group. Luz was very patient, caring and accommodated changes in itinerary several times. When a hotel messed up our reservations she jumped in and fixed it.
We love you, Luz.

Wilbert. Our guide in Cusco, Machu Picchu, Rainbow mountain and nearby attractions is awesome. He is local, knowledgeable, speaks good English and has the skills to herd our group. When some of us needed help to reach Rainbow summit Wilbert climbed down and helped us. Thank you, Billy.

Jimmy. Our driver for most of the time is courteous with a smile.
Written July 13, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

reviews.title: 8 Day Peru Tour by Waman/Tourrador  Adventues
reviews.text: We, a group of 11 from Colorado, had an awesome time in Peru with Waman Adventures / Tourradar. Our 8 day trip was planned around the Inca Sun Festival, including sight seeing, paragliding, cooking classes, buggy rides, sand boarding, swimming with Sea Lions, hiking Rainbow mountains and plenty of time in between to shop and relax. We covered all major attractions in Lima and Cusco. Our tour operators are local and the price is reasonable.  Hotels were decent and transports were comfortable. Overall, the service was great.  We highly recommend this tour.Luz Lucero. Our concierge Luz and I planned this trip 3 months ago.  Our group of 11 with various ages, abilities, interests, food choices is a tough group. Luz was very patient, caring and accommodated changes in itinerary several times.  When a hotel messed up our reservations she jumped in and fixed it.We love you, Luz.Wilbert. Our guide in Cusco, Machu Picchu, Rainbow mountain and nearby attractions is awesome.  He is local, knowledgeable, speaks good English and has the skills to herd our group. When some of us needed help to reach Rainbow summit Wilbert climbed down and helped us. Thank you, Billy.Jimmy. Our driver for most of the time is courteous with a smile.
